taxonomicnotes: Some of the synonyms of this species probably refer to other species.
rationale: The species is assessed as Data Deficient as the species requires taxonomic research as the species range as currently known is considered likely to represent a number of different species. In addition, there are likely to be significant threats in parts of its range, but the specific impacts of these threats, especially in relation to the species reproductive host bivalve is not known. Ongoing monitoring of population and habitat trends is also required.
evaluator: Kullander, S.O., Ng, H.H., Rainboth, W. & Allen, D.J.
